variables.name: log
variables.raw:
/**
 * A simple logger that only runs in dev environments.
 *
 * @param msg - A string or object to log
 *
 * @param color - Any CSS color value ( named | hex | rgb | hsl )
 *
 * @param bgColor - Same as color ⇧
 *
 * @param fontSize - Any number
 *
 * @param css - Optional additional CSS
 */
variables.summary: A simple logger that only runs in dev environments.

params.name: msg
params.description: A string or object to log

params.name: color
params.description: Any CSS color value ( named | hex | rgb | hsl )

variables.type: (msg: any, color?: string, bgColor?: string, fontSize?: number, css?: string) => void
